data.text:
Here comes Dwanta Claus delivering the WORLD’S BEST ICE CREAM @saltandstraw! 🎅🏾🍨
Get yours NOW! MERRY XMAS & HAPPY HOLIDAYS to you & your families. May all your cheat meals be merry & bright!
✌🏾out,
#DwantaClaus 🎅🏾
#SaltAndStraw 🍨
#DwantasGonnaGetSome 😈
https://t.co/57T0JkyPSo https://t.co/pSB3DceLIM
Just posted a photo https://t.co/NmHWn8HuqX

My @Teremana + @saltandstraw = the booziest, most delicious ice cream EVER 😋😈🥃🍨
Enjoy!👇🏾
https://t.co/57T0JkyPSo
ps - Mel, I’m sending you the ice cream this week! 
✌🏾 out - Dwanta 🎅🏾🖤 https://t.co/9qO8h3qG8T
https://t.co/Pi918GMC30

Beyond. Delicious. 🍨🥃
DWANTA’S @Teremana SPIKED EGG NOG ICE CREAM!🍦 
1$ donated to @WCKitchen for every pint sold to help families struggling with hunger. 
Teremana will also match every $1. 
FIVE Dwanta Claus flavors in all! 
Enjoy! 
Love, 
Dwanta🎅🏾🖤 & @saltandstraw 🍨 https://t.co/MyKw0TAcNz

.@TheRock's @Teremana featured in boozy @saltandstraw ice cream which will benefit World Central Kitchen 
https://t.co/gZ1W3HaJOH https://t.co/HyANZUVToN
Dwanta, baby! @TheRock and @saltandstraw have teamed up for another boozy ice cream collab, and we're not mad about it. https://t.co/qztPLxWLIi
Christmas came early, thanks to @TheRock and @saltandstraw! 🍨 https://t.co/OimtzHfrru
Sure, the ice cream is great. But the best part? $1 of every pint goes directly to @WCKitchen food relief efforts! Thanks @TheRock @saltandstraw 🙏 https://t.co/G0Z498RKQj
Wow!! Thanks to my beautiful followers, @vosswater and @TheRock I’m now at 230+ free lunches provided to our healthcare heroes. I’m so grateful right now. 🙏🏽 https://t.co/4JhCiidOSv
Just posted a video https://t.co/s1wYhtWwnd

Kickin’ off our #blackfriday drop!🚨🏈 Our @XFL2022 SHOP is officially OPEN for our loyal, bad ass & fun XFL UNIVERSE!
As owners, @danygarciaco & I are honored to deliver for you! 
For the love of football. 
#repyocity ✊🏾
#OwnersHat 🧢
https://t.co/Hd6PEV2eKf https://t.co/tSNVMGCyRu
It’s official now. @TheRock is the #BMF of Life. Dude has a balloon in the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade. https://t.co/jme8L9G3Nk
The Young Rock balloon may be the greatest fucking thing I've ever seen.  Rocking that fucking fanny pack!  @TheRock

where can we get this @TheRock ballon???

#MacysParade @Macys https://t.co/WGaMh7xACW
I still wore it better @TheRock https://t.co/T4G8A7HMnl https://t.co/nrkSDjZp0N
A young @TheRock balloon at the Thanksgiving Day Parade 😂 https://t.co/IOEMNOupf2

Well I’ve been lucky enough to do some pretty cool shit in my life.. but after seeing my @NBCYoungRock FANNY PACK FLOAT in the #MacysThanksgivingParade this might take the cake. 
My plucked raised eyebrow is the stuff dreams (and nightmares) are made of 🤣💀
#fannypack4life ✊🏾 https://t.co/QpoxfhVMzS

Can’t even articulate how cool it is to be on set for #YoungRock and how amazingly talented the cast and crew are.  In addition to telling the incredible stories of @TheRock’s youth, the 80’s wrestling fan in me is in a constant state of freaking out. @SevenBucksProd @nbc https://t.co/vFujtX94uI

It’s nice to be important, but it’s more important to be nice. A pleasure to illuminate @patrickthegiver & his selfless acts of kindness. Mahalo Patrick & my @vossworld partners for being altruistic forces when we need it most. Happy Thanksgiving to all of you & your families🖤 https://t.co/xDrqKZnXT5

The moments when we take that chance is when true greatness begins. 

You can't live your dreams if you don't swing for them. Take it from @therock, who, as a rookie in the @wwe, took the chance to ask Vince McMahon if he could get in a 2-minute speech.. 

The rest is history… https://t.co/HaJPnRfsTZ
Join us at 7pm est and bring your @Teremana for a toast and some Q&As 🥃 🤙🏾 https://t.co/sA3xTcFqHh
@therock hi Dwayne could you possibly give this fantastic donation from Stephen to our charity auction a retweet to help raise awareness? Thanks https://t.co/zoWa7QnM50

30yrs ago today, he made his iconic #SurvivorSeries debut.
Like EVERYONE - I was in awe as a rookie in the @WWE when his first words pierced my soul as he walked in the dressing room and said, “Muthafucka” True story 😂
Honored to share the ring w you, my brother. #ThankYouTaker https://t.co/ULlppOQlCa

The good stuff 🥃
Happy Birthday and enjoy your @Teremana!! Smoothest and cleanest in the land! https://t.co/wzLb5SmYhf

Love this look and power behind its meaning. Culture. 
Well done team and as always, to my former Miami teammate and Oregon football head coach, Mario Cristobal - stay strong, brother 💪🏾
#theu
#goducks 
#mana https://t.co/N4gStfOClA
Really cool moment with these young men when I was driving in my truck. And yes they went on to beat the fresh turkey hell outta their opponents that day 23-1 👀 ⚾️💪🏾 https://t.co/LChI20CVP0
Appreciate ya. I didn’t put all my gym bangers in my @Spotify playlist but it’s enough to get you hyped up to get after it 🔥💪🏾 https://t.co/nb8OCGRa2q

Wooohooo 🥳 it’s a @Teremana birthday!! 
Get loved up and celebrated today and enjoy, Rachel!! 🥃🎂 https://t.co/RFU6xBVCdu

The priceless - Cleopatra’s Egg. 

Are you sure you want to steal it on my watch? 

The FBI Profiler. 

The World’s Most Wanted Art Thief. 

And the greatest conman the world has never seen. 

Excited for you to see this movie.
